channel.title: Google Season of Docs (GSoD) documenation development has begun!
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
I'm @0brand
Today marks the start of the [Season of Docs](https://developers.google.com/season-of-docs/) writing phase where I will begin working on my project proposal with guidance from my mentor. @Patrick (Lead Whonix developer) will be my mentor for GSoD. The project chosen for this first ever Season of Docs is developing the core documentation for [Kicksecure OS](https://whonix.org/wiki/Kicksecure) with a focus on teaching beginners about Linux, and best practice that will lay the foundation for future learning. Anyone that would like to contribute and / or follow along with the GSoD Kicksecure project can follow this thread which will detail the work completed on an daily basis.
https://forums.whonix.org/t/document-installation-and-setup-of-the-new-security-focused-hardened-debian-linux-distribution-selected-by-whonix-for-season-of-docs-2019/7887
**Whonix Phabricator can also be used to follow documentation development.**
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T900
**For anyone that would like to get involved with Kicksecure development.**
https://forums.whonix.org/t/hardened-debian-security-focused-linux-distribution-based-on-debian-in-development-feedback-wanted/5943
**I'm very much looking forward to working with everyone to build a great project and an even greater Kicksecure community!**
